entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
